title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Interaction Between Social Capital and Individual Learning—Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: The impact of structural characteristics of social capital (including structural holes) on individual learning can be explained.
Social network analysis tools can be used to visualize and interpret an individual's network structure.
An empirical research design combining survey data and network data can be established.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
